data.title: Can Yair Golan Leverage His Hero Image to Build a 'Fresh, Exciting' Israeli Left?
data.meta_description: The Retired General's Show of Heroism on October 7 Transformed His Public Image. Now He Faces the Challenge of Turning His Newfound Popularity Into Votes. In an in Depth Interview, Golan Explains His Approach Toward the Gaza War, the Conflict With the Palestinians and Being a Leftist in Israel
data.text:
ICYMI

Poet, Karate Champion, Famed Artist: The Life Stories of 40 of the 40,000 Killed in Gaza

The Numbers Show: Gaza War Is One of the Bloodiest in the 21st Century

'Now, Many Israelis Have Evacuated Their Homes. But We Moved From One Planet to Another'

We Served on Israel's Sde Teiman Base. Here's What We Did to Gazan Detainees

Israel Wants to Trap Iran's 'Ghost Fleet,' Oil Tankers Financing Its Axis Under the Radar
